name: Himado Maid Cleaning
description: A bunch of maids gave himado video pages a fluid layout.
additional_info: Himawari douga is one of my favorite places to watch the latest anime because of the scrolling comments feature similar to Nicovideo. Of course, knowing Japanese is recommended. Several advertisement elements are hidden or minimized. You should adblock the rest. The quick search bar is expanded if you enabled it (click サイドバーのカスタマイズ, and check 表示する next to クイックサーチ). Video pages stretch fluid to the browser's width. Related videos are displayed in a table. Since I use himado almost daily, I'll update this userstyle if I notice anything that looks wrong. Update November 11: Fixed video controls for Chrome browsers.
